app.title: ImageFlow - Professional Image Processing Tool
app.subtitle: Free Online Image Compression & Format Conversion

upload.title: Upload Images
upload.dropzone: Drag images here, or click to select files
upload.subtitle: Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, AVIF, HEIC formats

compression.title: Compression Settings

formats.jpeg: Good for photos, small file size

compression.avifDescription: Will prioritize server-side processing for best quality, with automatic fallback to client-side processing if needed.

memeMode.title: Meme Mode
memeMode.description: Extreme compression for funny low-quality images
memeMode.warningDescription: This mode compresses images to extremely low quality (5-15%), perfect for creating funny meme images, not suitable for normal use.

preview.title: Live Preview Comparison
preview.selectImageHint: Preview comparison will be displayed after selecting images
preview.dragHint: Drag the divider to compare before and after compression

errors.title: Issues and Errors
errors.errorDescription: This is an error that may affect functionality
errors.warningDescription: This is a warning that may slightly affect functionality

statistics.title: Processing Statistics
statistics.uploadHint: Statistics will be displayed after uploading and processing images
statistics.bestFormatDescription: Recommended best format based on compression performance

footer.privacy: Your images are processed only in the browser, never uploaded to servers

about.title: About ImageFlow
about.description: ImageFlow is a professional online image processing tool focused on image compression and format conversion. We are committed to providing users with seamless, efficient, and secure image processing experience.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your images are processed only in the browser and never uploaded to servers. We value your privacy, and all processing is done locally to ensure your data security.

messages.fileTypeError: Unsupported file format, please upload image files
messages.networkError: Network connection failed, please check your connection and try again
messages.fileTooLarge: File too large, maximum supported size is {{maxSize}}
messages.quotaExceeded: Processing quota exceeded, please try again later
messages.fileCountExceeded: File count exceeds limit, maximum {{maxFiles}} files supported
messages.totalSizeExceeded: Total file size exceeds limit, maximum {{maxSize}}MB supported
